# `{{ $frontmatter.title }}` for [dataframe](/commands/categories/dataframe.md)

<div class='command-title'>{{ $frontmatter.dataframe }}</div>


::: warning
Dataframe commands were not shipped in the official binaries by default, you have to build it with `--features=dataframe` flag
:::
## Signature

```> dfr concatenate {flags} (other)```

## Parameters

 -  `other`: Other array with string to be concatenated


## Input/output types:

| input | output |
| ----- | ------ |
| any   | any    |

## Examples

Concatenate string
```nu
> let other = ([za xs cd] | dfr into-df);
    [abc abc abc] | dfr into-df | dfr concatenate $other
╭───┬───────╮
│ # │   0   │
├───┼───────┤
│ 0 │ abcza │
│ 1 │ abcxs │
│ 2 │ abccd │
╰───┴───────╯

```
